Hike tariffs on Chinese EVs, Senate Democrats urge Biden administrationThree Senate Democrats from auto manufacturing states on Thursday urged the Biden administration to hike import tariffs on Chinese electric vehicles to address national security risks, the latest push by lawmakers to protect the U.S. auto sector. Thu, 07 Mar 2024 18:14:30 GMT BEMZEOAHEBJ55IURNL7WW2SEYI https://www.reuters.com/business/autos-transportation/senate-democrats-urge-biden-administration-hike-tariffs-chinese-evs-2024-03-07/David Shepardson商业汽车与交通
Novo Nordisk expects China to approve Wegovy this yearNovo Nordisk said on Thursday it expects Wegovy to be approved for sale in China this year and plans to soon launch the popular weight-loss drug in the largest Asian market with capped volumes. Thu, 07 Mar 2024 16:34:07 GMT W7R4OHOK2FOQ3BLGGWKIFDF5IU https://www.reuters.com/business/healthcare-pharmaceuticals/novo-nordisk-expects-china-approve-wegovy-this-year-2024-03-07/Reuters可持续发展董事会、政策和法规
China growth target achievable if backed by more stimulus, analysts sayChina's 5% economic growth target for 2024 announced this week is ambitious and can be achieved if backed by further stimulus measures in monetary, fiscal and regulatory policy, analysts said. Thu, 07 Mar 2024 15:14:07 GMT 6MZ5H22DTZO7DLXFBQNI5JMXKE https://www.reuters.com/markets/asia/china-growth-target-achievable-if-backed-by-more-stimulus-analysts-say-2024-03-07/Anisha Sircar市场亚洲市场
China interference in Lithuania polls 'can't be ruled out', says security chiefChinese interference in this year's elections in EU and NATO member Lithuania "definitely cannot be ruled out" due to Lithuanian support for Taiwan, the chief of Lithuania’s counter-intelligence said on Thursday. Thu, 07 Mar 2024 11:31:32 GMT B3OXQQWJ4NONJFJVOBQ2AEJAS4 https://www.reuters.com/world/china-interference-lihuania-polls-cant-be-ruled-out-says-security-chief-2024-03-07/Andrius Sytas世界
US House committee set to vote on TikTok crackdown billThe U.S. House Energy and Commerce committee on Thursday is set to vote on legislation giving China's ByteDance six months to divest from short video app TikTok or face a U.S. ban. Thu, 07 Mar 2024 11:02:45 GMT 76D576RYEZNSVG2SPX4UAURVFY https://www.reuters.com/technology/new-push-congress-ban-tiktok-or-force-chinese-divestiture-gains-steam-2024-03-07/David Shepardson技术
Top official from China's Xinjiang says 'Sinicisation' of Islam 'inevitable'Xinjiang's top Communist Party official said on Thursday that the "Sinicisation" of Islam in the Muslim-majority region in northwestern China, where Beijing is accused of human rights abuses, is "inevitable". Thu, 07 Mar 2024 10:16:07 GMT XLARL7MJUZN5JFVR67IMEF45U4 https://www.reuters.com/world/china/top-official-chinas-xinjian-says-sinicization-islam-inevitable-2024-03-07/Laurie Chen世界中国
Hong Kong pushes new security bill at full speed, citing 'imminent' risksThe Hong Kong government will send the "Article 23" national security bill to the legislature on Friday, possibly cracking down further on dissent in the former British colony, with city leader John Lee calling for it to be passed "at full speed". Thu, 07 Mar 2024 09:30:30 GMT LVQP6D7ME5PTHFKCUWYBQBMBI https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/hong-kong-submit-new-national-security-bill-legislature-this-week-2024-03-07/James Pomfret, Jessie Pang世界亚太地区
Tanker Liteyny Prospect, hit by sanctions, docks in China to offload Russian oilThe Russian tanker Liteyny Prospect, hit by sanctions, has docked at the Chinese port of Huanghua to discharge its 700,000-barrel Russian Sokol crude cargo, two sources familiar with the matter said, clearing part of a backlog of cargoes disrupted by sanctions on Moscow's oil trade. Thu, 07 Mar 2024 08:20:19 GMT JULOWZJ3PVLUTDAQ6K236FAPYU https://www.reuters.com/business/energy/sanctioned-tanker-liteyny-prospect-docks-china-offload-Russian-oil-2024-03-07/Chen Aizhu, Florence Tan商业活力
Trying to contain China will only fuel its grievances, says Malaysian PMAttempts to contain China's rise would only aggravate the country and sow discord in the region, Malaysian Prime Minister Anwar Ibrahim said during a speech in Australia on Thursday. Thu, 07 Mar 2024 07:38:46 GMT PGGDQLHQRZIKZLRYBJUBITW7DM https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/trying-contain-china-will-only-fuel-its-grievances-says-malaysian-pm-2024-03-07/Lewis Jackson世界亚太地区
Japan says it is gravely concerned about closer military ties between China and RussiaJapan's top government spokesperson said on Thursday that Tokyo was gravely concerned about closer military cooperation between China and Russia in light of security for Japan as well as for the region. Hong Kong judges dismiss appeal in sedition case for pro-democracy radio hostThree Hong Kong High Court judges on Thursday rejected an appeal by pro-democracy activist Tam Tak-chi against his conviction and 40 month sentence on charges which included 7 sedition offences. Thu, 07 Mar 2024 03:54:23 GMT 6VHUYFKM2JKD7JBIIGONHQNZXY https://www.reuters.com/world/hong-kong-judges-dismiss-appeal-sedition-case-pro-democracy-radio-host-2024-03-07/Jessie Pang世界
